bug.author: waytrue17
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
There is a typo in "crash course tutorial" website. In the "Get data" session of "Train the neural network" chapter, the tutorial says "Next, we visualize the first six examples" while the actual code displays first ten examples. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52505574/78936894-4b7ca680-7a64-11ea-8718-842f9b8f57fc.png></denchmark-link>
